articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Supreme Council of Armed Forces of Egypt
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Supreme Council of Armed Forces of Egypt
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Mohamed Hussein Tantawi, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Armed Forces of the Arab Republic of Egypt, on May 2.
					 The message said:
					
					 I would like to sincerely congratulate Your Excellency upon your election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 I wish you success in your new office and the friendly Korean people progress and prosperity.
					
					 Please accept my sincere regards.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Malaysian Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Malaysian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Datuk Seri Tengku Adnan Tengku Mansor, secretary general of the United Malays National Organization of Malaysia, on April 20.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warmest congratulations and greetings to you on your election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the WPK Central Military Commission and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on behalf of all the members of the United Malays National Organization.
					
					 We are sure that the DPRK will make greater progress and prosperity in building a great prosperous and powerful nation under your wise leadership.
					
					 Let me take this opportunity to wish you good health and greater successes in your responsible work for realizing the desire of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Lao National Assembly
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Lao National Assembly
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from the delegation of the Lao National Assembly on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Pany Yathortou, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao National Assembly who is leading the delegation, handed over the gift to Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Friday.

articles.title: Lao Delegation Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
Lao Delegation Tours Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao National Assembly visited the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm on Friday. The delegation is led by President of the Lao National Assembly Pany Yathortou who is member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
					 Being briefed on the grand orchard, the guests enjoyed the panoramic view of the farm.
					
					 The head of the delegation made an entry in the visitor's book.
					
					 Noting that he saw the very wonderful farm, he added that such fruit production base could be built thanks to the wise guidance of the great leaders.
					
					 The delegation toured the Hana Music Information Centre.
					
					 The head of the delegation wrote in the visitor's book that after visiting the place associated with the leadership feats of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, he was deeply impressed by this. He wished the Korean people great success in the music art field under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Taedonggang Terrapin Farm and Moranbong Secondary School No. 1.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the visiting delegation of the Lao National Assembly headed by its President Pany Yathortou, who is member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 Pany Yathortou said she was pleased to visit the DPRK at a significant time. 
					
					 The friendship between Laos and the DPRK provided by President Kaysone Phomvihane and President Kim Il Sung has been steadily developed by leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un, she noted.
					
					 She expressed deep thanks to the party, government and people of the DPRK for having rendered positive support to the Lao party, government and people.
					
					 The achievements made by the Korean people greatly inspired the Lao party, government and people in their efforts to build socialism, she said.
					
					 She expressed conviction that the Korean people would register bigger achievements in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, true to the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Huang Shizai, president of the Great Chinese International Group, and his party arrived here by air on Friday.
					 On the same day, the delegation of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea led by Chairman Dmitri Kostenko went back home.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Learns about Work in Tanchon Area on Spot
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Tanchon Area
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim inspected the Tanchon Magnesia Factory and the Tanchon Smeltery on Thursday.
					 The workers in Tanchon are making signal achievements in their efforts to put the production processes on Juche and modern basis, true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The premier acquainted himself with the work of the Tanchon Magnesia Factory.
					
					 He went round the newly built cultural and welfare facilities and construction site of combined fire-proof materials production process.
					
					 Looking round the facilities he said that the officials should serve the convenience of the workers on a priority basis and look after their life with care, keeping deep in their minds the dear respected Kim Jong Un's maxim of loving the people.
					
					 He also stressed the need to finish the construction of the fire-proof materials production process in a short period of time and keep the production going successfully by putting the production processes on a modern and scientific basis.
					
					 The premier went to the Tanchon Smeltery, which Kim Jong Il gave field guidance in his lifetime.
					
					 Touring various places of the Smeltery, he mentioned the need to increase the production of processed goods by introducing advanced technologies, setting up new processes, further heightening the level of technical skills and laying material and technical foundations for the timely and successful dressing of concentrated ores.
					
					 At a consultation meeting the premier stressed the need for everyone to turn out in the building of an economic power to register higher production records, remaining true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Order of Kim Jong Il Awarded to Mansudae Art Studio
articles.content:
Order of Kim Jong Il Awarded to Mansudae Art Studio
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Order of Kim Jong Il was awarded to the Mansudae Art Studio, a leading fine art center in the DPRK.
					 The art studio organized by leader Kim Jong Il is staffed with persons of experience and perseverance with boundless loyalty. 
					
					 It spearheaded the project of building the gigantic statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and their equestrian statues in the compound of the studio as well as portraying the great men of Mt. Paektu in many major units.
					
					 It created a number of fine art works depicting the spirit of the era of Songun, which were greatly conducive to imbuing the service persons, people and school youth and children with the revolutionary outlook on the leader and encouraging them to building a thriving nation.
					
					 A decree on conferring the order was released on Wednesday by the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: E-Library Built in North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
E-Library Built in North Phyongan Province
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The North Phyongan Provincial Library has been built in Sinuiju City, the northwestern tip of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The three-storied library, covering a plottage of thousands of square meters, houses a tele-lecture room, computerized lecture room, e-reading room, book-lending room, etc.
					
					 The several-thousand-seat library boasts of a host of books and high-end equipment.
					
					 It also renders sci-tech information service activities, mingled with mobile and ordered service activities.
					
					 The library will greatly help local people acquire up-to-date knowledge.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued a postage stamp to commemorate the 40th anniversary of the Three Principles for National Reunification.
					 On May 3, Juche 61 (1972) President Kim Il Sung set forth the three principles in his talk with representatives of south Korea who attended the north-south high-level political talks in Pyongyang.
					
					 The main idea of the principles is to achieve the national reunification independently and peacefully free from outsiders' interference and without reliance on armed forces and promote the great unity of the nation irrespective of differing ideology and social system.
					
					 Seen in the upper part of the stamp are letters "In commemoration of the 40th anniversary of the three principles for national reunification" and "May 3, Juche 61 (1972)".
					
					 Also printed in it are letters "Independence", "Peaceful reunification" and "Great national unity" and pictures of the Korean Peninsula flag and the Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower.

articles.title: Health Complex for Workers Built in Factory in DPRK
articles.content:
Health Complex for Workers Built in Factory in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Kangsong Health Complex for workers was newly built in a machine factory far away from the capital city in the DPRK.
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, who regards the wellbeing of the people as a priority issued an order for the KPA to build the complex of the factory managed by Ho Chol Yong on the highest level on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.   
					
					 The Complex, built in a matter of over 70 days through the lightning and three-dimensional operation of soldier-builders, is fully equipped with welfare service facilities.
					
					 It has a total floor space of over 10 000 square meters. Fascinating is the gate hall with a large mosaic of Ullim Falls on the front wall. On its first floor there are swimming pool, wading pool, shower room, public bath, private bath, dining hall, kitchen and photo studio. The barbershop and beauty salon on the second floor have good equipment. There are also gym and table tennis rooms, e-library and recreation room.
					
					 Baths are equipped with lockers of peculiar design and bathing utensils while a dining hall with hundreds of seats. The dining hall can also provide services for wedding ceremony of workers, meetings for congratulating innovators, etc. as it has big karaoke equipment. The complex has noticeable interior delicate and elegant in formative and artistic aspects.

articles.title: Conferences of Working People's Organisations to Be Held in Korea
articles.content:
Conferences of Working People's Organisations to Be Held in Korea
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Conferences of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea are to be held here from late May to early June.
					 Discussed there will be the tasks of the working people's organisations to hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as eternal leaders of the Party and revolution, carry through the decision of the Fourth Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea and build a thriving socialist nation under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Architectural Festival, Symposium to Be Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Architectural Festival, Symposium to Be Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The 12th May 21 architectural festival and the 7th symposium on architectural aesthetics will be held here between May 9 and 11.
					 The festival will open, divided into various events including prize contests of architectural designs, national scientific symposium on architecture and construction and contests for modernization of architectural designs.
					
					 Valuable papers, architectural designing programs and multimedia will be presented to the festival.
					
					 At the symposium the participants will discuss issues arising in proving the validity of the idea and theory of leader Kim Jong Il on architectural aesthetics, glorifying his undying feats and building more edifices in Songun era true to the sublime intention of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Symposium on Medical Science Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Symposium on Medical Science Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The 14th Pyongyang symposium on medical science of Koreans at home and abroad took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday and Friday.
					 Present there were Ri Pong Hun, chairman of the Central Committee of the Medical Association of Korea, health workers and members of the delegation of Korean medical workers in Japan led by Kim Tae Sik, vice-chairman of the Korean Health Workers Association in Japan, and the delegation of Korean medical workers in the U.S. led by Pak Mun Jae, vice-chairman of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. 
					
					 Ri Pong Hun made an opening address to be followed by congratulatory speeches by Kim Tae Sik and Pak Mun Jae.
					
					 There was a general lecture on the "development of researches into the transplantation of organs" and "study of stem cell and the prospect for its development."
					
					 The participants heard papers dealing with "research into CD105 chain antibody for its production and use,"  "cholecystostomy," etc.
					
					 The symposium introduced achievements and experience gained in solving scientific and technological issues in health services and applying achievements in the ultramodern science and technology to prevention and cure of diseases. 
					
					 Certificates were conferred on those who presented papers to the symposium.

articles.title: April 25 Sports Team Wins National First-rate Soccer Tournament
articles.content:
April 25 Sports Team Wins National First-rate Soccer Tournament
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The first-rate soccer tournament took place in Pyongyang as part of the National Sports Festival for Mangyongdae Prize celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Competing in the tournament on a round-robin basis were 12 men's teams and 10 women's teams.
					
					 The April 25 Sports Team placed first in men's and women's football events, each with seven wins and four draws in 11 matches and seven wins and two draws in nine matches.
					
					 The Pyongyang City Sports Team came second in the men's soccer event and the Amnokgang Sports Team in the women's soccer event while the third place in men's and women's soccer events was taken by the Amnokgang Sports Team and the Sobaeksu Sports Team. 
					
					 The top scorer prize went to Kang Jin Hyok of the Myohyangsan men's team for eight goals and Ra Un Sim of the Amnokgang women's team for nine goals.

articles.title: State Commendations to Creators, Employees and Officials of Mansudae Art Studio
articles.content:
State Commendations to Creators, Employees and Officials of Mansudae Art Studio
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- State commendations went to creators, employees and officials of the Mansudae Art Studio who made distinguished feats in creating works portraying images of the great persons of Mt. Paektu. They have made great contributions to encouraging the service personnel and people to dynamically turn out in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and in effecting a great surge in production and construction. 
					 It is a great auspicious event that people of the DPRK erected statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to hand down through all generations the revolutionary careers of the peerlessly great men and their undying exploits, and demonstrated the dignity of the country and the nation all over the world. 
					
					 They built the statues at the highest level in hundred-odd days by waging a sacred drive to realize the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea for perpetuating the memory of the leaders.
					
					 Hong Chang Ui, U Ung Ho and five others received the title of Labor Hero of the DPRK together with gold medal (hammer and sickle) and the Order of National Flag First Class, and four people Kim Jong Il Prize and six people Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize. 
					
					 The title of People's Artist went to 8, title of Merited Artist to 29,  title of Merited Technician to 7, title of Merited Driver to one, title of Merited Printer to one, Order of National Flag First Class to 45, Order of Labor to 60, Order of National Flag Second Class to 150, Order of National Flag Third Class to 230 and Medal of Merit to 300. 
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly on the commendations was released on Thursday.

articles.title: Military Dog Training Camp Seized with Rage at S. Korean Regime's Hideous Provocation
articles.content:
Military Dog Training Camp Seized with Rage at S. Korean Regime's Hideous Provocation
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Military dog trainers of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), enraged at south Korea's rat-like Lee Myung Bak group who dared desecrate the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, are putting spurs to military trainings to kill the group to the last man. 
					 A KPISF officer, Kim Yong Bom, told KCNA:
					
					 "Now I am fully ready to join the special operation action group of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army along with my dog to cut off the windpipe of rattish Myung Bak. 
					
					 Military dogs, too, get ferocious when seeing the targets picturing Lee Myung Bak, Kim Kwan Jin, Jong Sung Jo and the paid media organs or hearing their disgusting names.
					
					 My dog alone is enough to tear them to pieces, I think. I am willing to go to Seoul now to make a clean sweep of the squeaking rat-like Lee group."
					
					 In training dogs were seen cruelly biting off targets picturing the Lee swarm of rats.

articles.title: Confrontation with Compatriots Is Inveterate Habit of Lee Myung Bak Regime: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Confrontation with Compatriots Is Inveterate Habit of Lee Myung Bak Regime: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday brands the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea as a heinous group of traitors only seeking confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					 The south Korean conservative group regards as a thorn in the flesh the inter-Korean relations which had developed on good terms since the June 15 joint declaration was published, the daily said in a bylined article, adding:
					
					 The group has persistently sought to turn back the era of independent reunification and repeat the history of confrontation with the compatriots in the north. 
					
					 After seating Lee Myung Bak in the chair of "president", the south Korean conservatives have tried hard to deteriorate inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The south Korean reactionary forces came into being based on treachery, not any common idea and have escalated the confrontation with compatriots and anti-reunification moves to survive. It is not surprising that traitor Lee, representing the group of sordid traitors, has taken the path of the north-south confrontation and a war.
					
					 The plight faced by Lee is behind its desperate bid to escalate the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The Lee group kicked up unprecedented racket to dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. This is aimed to blur the critical eyes of the masses focused on the conservative regime. 
					
					 The regime is pushing a war chariot of the U.S. with all its efforts out of the calculation to elicit support from its master and prolong its remaining days. It is the reason that the Lee group is working hard to escalate inter-Korean confrontation bereft of reason and discretion.
					
					 As had already been declared, the DPRK will launch its own style sacred war, war of retaliation, by putting into use all its military potentials in order to mercilessly wipe out the Lee group and turn the bases of provocation to ashes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Decries Lee Myung Bak's Ambition for "Unification of Social Systems"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Decries Lee Myung Bak's Ambition for "Unification of Social Systems"
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak underlined the necessity of funding the "Unification Jar" before his stooges in Chongwadae on Apr. 28. He also claimed that he would be the first to donate money.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday carries a bylined commentary in this regard.
					
					 Lee formed the "Unification Jar" allegedly to save "money for unification" following suit of the "East and West Germanys' unification method", says the commentary, calling it a replica of the "unification tax" that was failed in the face of strong public protest.
					
					 This concept envisages saving "money for unification" with the fund collected from civilians and the "Fund for South-North Cooperation" that was reduced to a fund for confrontation and division against reunification, it says, adding:
					
					 The Lee's clique claimed that "saving money is essential for making preparations for unification and it is a bipartisan priority". It even let loose sophism that "the donation of money to the unification jar would be the process of pooling the will for unification".
					
					 This evidently proves the group of traitors' persevering efforts to fix as an established fact the "unification of social systems" that presupposes the breakdown of the idea and social system of fellow countrymen, and realize its pipe dream with money.
					
					 Irony is that just like the proposal for "unification tax", miser-like Lee group's act of taking the reunification, desire of the Korean nation, into financial consideration was criticized and ridiculed by south Koreans of different social standings.
					
					 As the "Unification Jar" campaign hardly made any progress, the traitor reluctantly took out a few pennies from his purse. 
					
					 This indicates his desperate efforts to hurt the fellow countrymen, while regarding the "Unification Jar" as a means for justifying the worn-out "north policy" and supporting its ambition for "unification of social systems".
					
					 Lee's shameless conduct created another tragic political story that revealed the nature of the ugly rat-like group.
					
					 It is impossible for the puppet group to realize the ambition for "unification of social systems".

articles.title: Pomminryon S. Headquarters Brands Lee Myung Bak as Lackey of U.S. and Japan
articles.content:
Pomminryon S. Headquarters Brands Lee Myung Bak as Lackey of U.S. and Japan
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) on Tuesday in a statement said that pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese lackey Lee Myung Bak is the target of the struggle. 
					 During its term the Lee regime turned south Korea into ruins with acts against the June 15 joint declaration, war exercises against the north, fascist suppression, corruption and illegalities. It also seriously hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK during mourning over the great loss to the nation and the grand festival timed for the Day of the Sun, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The workers will beat to death the Lee's regime with their iron fists.
					
					 A tiny handful of the Lee's conservative forces violated the life of the workers and other masses and reduced them to slaves of modern version. 
					
					 The workers will defeat the Lee forces which vociferate about American-style liberal democracy.
					
					 Now this land is greeting the time of drastic change to root out the traitorous and unpopular forces. 
					
					 Let all the workers bravely turn out in the grand march for big change in the spirit of "By our nation itself" keeping in mind that independent reunification is the only way for saving the workers from miserable fate. 
					
					 Let's break the chains of the U.S. military dominationism and neo-liberalism with hammer and throw away the pro-U.S. ultra-right forces to the garbage ground of history.

articles.title: Peace of Korean Peninsula Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Peace of Korean Peninsula Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea issued a joint appeal under the title of "Let's terminate the north-south military confrontation and push forward the realization of peace on the Korean Peninsula" on Tuesday, May Day.
					 The south and north have failed to hold a joint ceremony on May Day since Lee Myung Bak took office, the appeal said.
					
					 Peace on this land has been seriously jeopardized with military conflicts looming due to the south-north relations that have been plunged to a total deadlock, it deplored.
					
					 Had the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration been thoroughly implemented, the on-going crisis wouldn't have occurred, it said.
					
					 The south-north confrontation and conflict would get Koreans nowhere, it noted, urging the "government" to opt for the implementation of declarations, though belatedly.
					
					 The organizations will struggle in the van of workers for putting an end to confrontation and ensuring peace on the peninsula through unity and solidarity, it stressed.

articles.title: S. Korea's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign under Fire
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The ultra-right conservative forces of south Korea held an event called "week for freedom of the north" from the end of April to early in May. During the period they scattered anti-DPRK leaflets, not content with screening movies slandering the DPRK and staging rally and street demonstration in demand of the "improvement of human rights" in the north.
					 Minju Joson Friday says in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The smear "human rights" campaign can never be pardoned as it was an open mockery of the DPRK.
					
					 What is serious is that the ultra-right conservative forces kicked up the above-said racket, a challenge to the notice of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces that they would soon launch a special operation action to smash the reckless challenge by the group of traitors.
					
					 This lashed the army and people of the DPRK into greater fury. The south Korean conservative forces are running amuck, unaware of their rival. The DPRK has never made an empty word. It is a stark fact recognized by the world that the DPRK unconditionally put into practice what it declared it would do. So opposition parties and civic and public organizations of south Korea have urged the authorities to roll back the high-handed policy toward the north after the notice of the special action, saying that the policy pursued by Lee Myung Bak plunged the north-south relations into a phase of crisis. The ultra-right conservative forces' madcap racket, going against people's mindset, is as foolish an act as turning themselves into the targets of the special operation action of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK.
					
					 Days are numbered for the group of ultra-right conservatives to go to hell together with rat-like Lee Myung Bak, who is more dead than alive.

articles.title: S. Koreans Warn Authorities against Renewed Import of U.S. Beef
articles.content:
S. Koreans Warn Authorities against Renewed Import of U.S. Beef
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- South Koreans are becoming increasingly vocal accusing the "government" authorities of seeking to continue the import of American beef infected with mad cow disease.
					 The policy chief of the Confederation of Public Health and Medical Organization on April 30 asserted that the "government" should certainly keep the promise it made with the people in 2008 to immediately stop the beef import if mad cow disease breaks out in the U.S. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the "government" is taking issue with the people's demand, talking about over-reaction to the mad cow disease, he said, and went on:
					
					 If examination proves positive for mad cow disease in 0.1 percent of imported beef, the result is clear with other beef.
					
					 Problem is the members of the investigation to be dispatched soon to the U.S. by the "government" and their activities. The south Koreans of different social standings are criticizing them as a tourist group, not investigation group.
					
					 A professor of Seoul National University held a press conference at Chonggye Plaza urging the "government" to deliver on its 2008 promise with the people and stop the import of American beef and hold renegotiations.

articles.title: Candlelight Action Launched in S. Korea in Protest against U.S. Beef Import
articles.content:
Candlelight Protest Launched in S. Korea against U.S. Beef Import
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Candlelight protest was staged again in south Korea against the U.S. beef import.
					 A candlelight rally was held in Chonggye Plaza, Seoul on May 2 with more than 5 000 people from all walks of life attending.
					
					 The ralliers denounced the authorities for not stopping the import of American beef even though mad cow disease broke out again in a cattle ranch of the U.S. shortly ago, sparking off world-wide furor.
					
					 They urged the authorities to stop at once the beef import and opt for holding renegotiations for the "Free Trade Agreement" with the U.S.
					
					 The candlelight rally lasted through the following day.
					
					 There were big candlelight demonstrations in south Korea in 2008 in protest against the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' sycophantic moves to import the American beef, dealing a big blow to the puppet ruling forces.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Censured by Peruvian Figure, Ecuadorian Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Censured by Peruvian Figure, Ecuadorian Organization
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- A personage of Peru and an organization of Ecuador denounced the Lee Myung Bak regime of  south Korea for speaking ill of the celebrations of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, after hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, in a statement on April 26 condemned the group of rat-like traitors for going reckless to mar the celebrations which are admired by the whole world.
					
					 It is quite natural that the DPRK took steps to silence the Lee group, dogs of Yankees, who are working hard to put south Korea under their control forever, he said, and went on:
					
					 The provocative act of the south Korean puppet regime against the DPRK is an unpardonable crime.
					
					 The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru is convinced that the DPRK will shatter the provocation moves of the south Korean venomous serpents and deal a heavy blow by force of arms at the U.S. imperialists who divided the Korean Peninsula into two.
					
					 The Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People in a statement on the same day stressed that no desperate moves of the south Korean puppet forces can ever break down the minds of the world progressives looking up to the sun's Korea as beacon, adding that the group of traitors will not escape curse and denunciation.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Mexico, France
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Mexico, France
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Events took place on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 11 and 13.
					 They included a seminar on Kim Il Sung's exploits in Mexico and celebration meeting, photo exhibition and film show in France.
					
					 Displayed in the venues were works of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, photos showing their immortal exploits and books and photos introducing Korea.
					
					 The president of the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the reporter and speakers said that   Kim Il Sung was a prominent thinker and theoretician, a rare political elder and a tender-hearted father of the people, who founded the immortal Juche idea and led the revolutionary cause of Juche to victory through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and outstanding leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was an ever-victorious banner and great Songun brilliant commander who developed the Juche idea and Songun idea into the guiding idea in the era of independence and wisely led the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence, they said.
					
					 The president of the France-Korea Friendship Association said that the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by Kim Il Sung and carried forward by Kim Jong Il is being successfully forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He extended full support and solidarity to the Korean people in the efforts to carry out the plans and desires of Kim Il Sung and      Kim Jong Il, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A scientific seminar took place in Moscow under the sponsorship of the Russian Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 100th Birth Anniversary of President Kim Il Sung from late February to mid-April.

articles.title: KPA Introduced by Ethiopian Organization
articles.content:
KPA Introduced by Ethiopian Organization
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea issued its bulletin No. 36 on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 In an article titled "People's Army" the bulletin said that the 80-year-long history of the KPA shows well that it is the people's army.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Korean People's Revolutionary Army (the predecessor of the KPA) which was founded on April 25, 1932 by President Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, waged the grim anti-Japanese war to liberate Korea on August 15, 1945 and afterwards developed to be the regular armed forces.
					
					 The KPA, together with the Korean people, displayed the heroic feats in beating back the aggressors in the Korean war ignited by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 It is regarding it as one of its most important tasks to struggle for the happiness of the people.
					
					 KPA soldiers are startling people by ensuring the unimaginable speed and highest quality in each major construction site across the country at a time when the building of a thriving nation is progressing apace.

articles.title: Anniversary of KPA Marked by Cambodian Media
articles.content:
Anniversary of KPA Marked by Cambodian Media
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Cambodian media observed the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA) between April 8 and 23.
					 The paper Pracheachon carried an article titled "80 years of victory and glory" with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The Korean People's Revolutionary Army, founded by President Kim Il Sung, defeated Japanese imperialism and liberated Korea through hard-fought struggle, the article said, and continued:
					
					 The KPA, which had grown to be the regular armed forces under the leadership of the President, won a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War to repel the invasion by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The KPA is reliably defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country while shattering the U.S. ceaseless military provocation moves in every way.
					
					 AKP introduced in detail the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, saying that the DPRK could win victory after victory in the continued political and military confrontation with the hostile forces because he firmly consolidated the self-defensive capabilities.
					
					 Apsara TV and Radio praised him as a peerlessly elder statesman and Songun brilliant commander.
					
					 State Radio and F.M. 90.5 Radio reported about feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in founding and strengthening the KPA, adding that the history of victory and glory of the KPA will continue along with prospering socialist Korea.

articles.title: Japanese Politicians' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine Slammed
articles.content:
Japanese Politicians' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine Slammed
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, roughly 80 members of the "Association of Dietmen for Visiting Yasukuni Shrine" of Japan made a group visit to the shrine to be followed by a similar visit by leading officials of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined commentary condemned the visits by the Japanese politicians as a reckless act to call back the departed soul of militarism.
					
					 The supra-partisan Dietmen of Japan and senior party officials once again prayed for the souls of those who were executed, judged by history. This is a mockery of justice and human conscience and grave challenge to them.
					
					 Every year the Japanese reactionaries pay group visits to the shrine on the defeat day of the Japanese imperialists, big religious events in spring and autumn and other important occasions.
					
					 They seek to make the visit a regular and popular one and a state-sponsored ceremony in an attempt to consolidate the ideological ground of militarism.
					
					 The act of fanning up militarism and tampering with history as evidenced by the visit by the Japanese reactionaries serves as initial manure for instilling militarist idea into the rising generations in Japan.
					
					 Not a few young Japanese are lionizing as patriots and heroes the A-class war criminals who were sentenced to death, thinking that they sacrificed their lives to defend Japan from the Western powers' invasion of Asia and making up their minds to fight as they did.
					
					 Slogan "Let's fight like a man on battlefield and be buried in the Yasukuni Shrine" shouted here and there during the Japanese Imperial period, are still being heard after decades.
					
					 Japan's reinvasion of Asia is now becoming a reality.
					
					 The ultra-right politicians' reckless act will cause more serious disaster to Japan.

articles.title: Russian FM Decries U.S. and West Sanctions against Iran
articles.content:
Russian FM Decries U.S. and West Sanctions against Iran
 Moscow, May 3 (KCNA) -- Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov recently decried the U.S. and West's sanctions against Iran. 
					 The sanctions against the bank system of Iran are in violation of the rules of the IMF also, he said.
					
					 The U.S. and West's unilateral sanctions are, in fact, aimed to suffocate Iran's economy, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona comandancia de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona comandancia de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la comandancia de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC.
					Le acompanaron en esta inspeccion los cuadros directivos del partido y el ejercito Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Chol Hae, Pak To Chun, Son Chol Ju, Pak Jae Gyong, Ri Jae Il, Kim Myong Guk y Hwang Pyong So.
					
					Le recibieron en la comandancia el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Pyong Chol, comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, y el teniente general del EPC Son Chong Nam y otros generales y oficiales.
					
					Tras recibir el parte de recepcion, Kim Jong Un recorrio la sala de educacion de la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					Al ver los datos exhibidos, dijo emocionado que gracias a la extraordinaria idea militar y sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, nacieron las fuerzas aereas del heroico EPC y crecieron como invencibles filas de combate.
					
					El orgulloso presente de las fuerzas aereas del EPC tiene su origen en la aviacion de la nueva Corea, fundada por el Presidente poco despues de la liberacion del pais, dijo e instituyo la fecha de fundacion de ella, el 29 de noviembre, como Dia de la Aviacion.
					
					Enterado de que fallecieron los pilotos heroes que habian participado en la guerra vietnamita, dio la indicacion de enterrarlos en el cementerio de los martires heroes del EPC.
					
					A continuacion, paso revista al puesto de mando y las salas de estudio de operaciones averiguando en detalles como la unidad cumple su mision y servicio de guardia.
					
					Evaluo altamente los exitos de trabajo de los comandantes y uniformados de la comandancia mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos defendieran el cielo de la patria de modo inexpugnable tras asimilar los autoctonos metodos de combate del partido y adquirir gran capacidad de mando operacional y combatividad con que se puede enfrentar una guerra moderna.
					
					Al distinguir a los soldados que lloraban de emocion luego de escribir con esmero en la pizarra de registro de circunstancias del puesto de mando la frase de "Comandante Supremo, !cuanto queriamos verle!", Kim Jong Un los llamo a su lado.
					
					Abrazando a esos soldados que se le acercaron sobresaltados de alegria con la exclamacion de "!Comandante Supremo!", el tomo una foto de recuerdo con ellos.
					
					Visito una tras otra las salas de estudio de operaciones y elogio el hecho de que ellas fueron acondicionadas para estudiar profundamente y aplicar cabalmente las autoctonas estrategias y tacticas militares y metodos de combate del partido.
					
					Presento las tareas importantes que serviran de guia para fortalecer las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del pais, destacando que la aviacion juega un papel muy importante en defender con firmeza la patria socialista desde la agresion de los enemigos.
					
					Kim Jong Un recorrio las facilidades de cultura y educacion y de intendencia como la casa de los militares, el edificio de servicios para los soldados Pyongsawon y el comedor de la comandancia.
					
					Me gustan todas las cosas de aqui y no hay nada defectuoso, dijo y agrego que esta unidad es el mejor ejemplo para todo el ejercito.
					
					Reconocio en tono carinoso los esfuerzos de las cocineras y se retrato con ellas.
					
					Seguidamente, examino los equipos tecnicos de combate desarrollados por la unidad por cuenta propia.
					
					Despues de escuchar explicaciones detalladas de la eficiencia y el estado de introduccion de los materiales y equipos tecnicos de combate, senalo que estos equipos magnificos los pueden desarrollar unicamente los uniformados que piensan mucho y trabajan con pasion para perfeccionar la preparacion de combate.
					
					Encomendo que dijeran a los militares participantes en la invencion de dichos equipos que el Comandante Supremo los ha visto con mucho aprecio.
					
					Evaluo altamente una vez mas el emprendedor modo de trabajo de los directivos de la unidad que registran constantes innovaciones y auge proyectando y realizando en alto nivel todas las labores militares y politicas en pleno acato a la idea del partido de superar el nivel sofisticado.
					
					Finalmente, se tiro una foto de recuerdo con los oficiales y soldados de la unidad expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos defenderan firmemente la patria socialista, que marcha adelante hacia la victoria final, manteniendose en la perfecta disposicion de combate.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de delegacion de Laos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de delegacion de Laos
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio regalo que le dedicara la delegacion de la Asamblea Nacional de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao presidida por la presidenta Pany Yathortou, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, de visita en Corea.
					La jefa de la delegacion lo entrego este viernes a Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de dirigente de partido politico malayo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de dirigente de partido politico malayo
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le remitiera el 20 de abril Datuk Seri Tengku Adnan Tengku Mansor, secretario general de la Organizacion Nacional de Malayos Unidos de Malasia.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En representacion de todos los miembros de la Organizacion Nacional de Malayos Unidos de Malasia, le dirijo a Su Excelencia la mas calurosa felicitacion y saludo por su eleccion como Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Estamos convencidos de que bajo la sabia orientacion de Su Excelencia vuestro pais logre grandes avances y prosperidad en la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Aprovechamos esta oportunidad para desearle a Su Excelencia buena salud y notables exitos en su trabajo responsable por realizar el deseo de Su Excelencia gran Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitacion de Mohamed Hussein Tantawi
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitacion de Mohamed Hussein Tantawi
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 2 Mohamed Hussein Tantawi, presidente del Consejo Supremo de las Fuerzas Armadas de la Republica Arabe de Egipto.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Me alegra enviar la sincera felicitacion a Su Excelencia por su eleccion como Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Formulo votos por exitos en el cumplimento de nuevo cargo de Su Excelencia y el progreso y prosperidad al pueblo coreano.
					
					Reciba mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Laos
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Laos
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio este viernes en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion de la Asamblea Nacional de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao encabezada por su presidenta Pany Yathortou, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao.
					En la ocasion, la presidenta dijo que le regocija visitar a la RPDC en un momento significativo.
					
					Las relaciones de amistad entre Laos y Corea, preparadas por el presidente Kaysone Phomvihane y el Presidente Kim Il Sung, vino desarrollandose sin cesar gracias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, senalo la presidenta y prosiguio:
					
					Expreso el profundo agradecimiento al partido, al gobierno y al pueblo de la RPDC que apoyan activamente la lucha del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Laos.
					
					Todos los resultados logrados por el pueblo coreano sirven de gran estimulo para el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo laosianos que luchan por el socialismo.
					
					Estoy convencido de que en acato a la idea y la causa de los lideres el pueblo coreano lograra notables exitos en la construccion del Estado prospero siguiendo la direccion de Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Premier coreano averigua labor de zona de Tanchon
articles.content:
Premier coreano averigua labor de zona de Tanchon
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea Choe Yong Rim recorrio el dia 3 la Fabrica de Magnesia de Tanchon y la Fundicion de Metales no Ferrosos de Tanchon.
					Los obreros de Tanchon registran las  innovaciones en realizar la jucheanizacion y modernizacion de los procesos productivos en acato al legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En la Fabrica de Magnesia de Tanchon, Choe recorrio el establecimiento de cultura y de servicios publicos nuevamente construido, el campo de construccion del proceso productivo general de materiales refractarios, y otros lugares.
					
					En el mencionado establecimiento, el premier coreano senalo que los funcionarios, guardando en lo profundo de su corazon el proposito de amor al pueblo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, deben asegurar primordialmente las comodidades de los trabajadores y atender bien la vida de ellos.
					
					Recalco la necesidad de terminar en un corto tiempo el proceso productivo general de materiales refractarios y realizar en el alto nivel la modernizacion y cientifizacion del proceso productivo, y de esta manera avivar el fervor para normalizar la produccion.
					
					En la Fundicion de Metales no Ferrosos de Tanchon, donde estan impregnadas las huellas de produccion del Dirigente, el premier recorrio varios puntos de la empresa, donde se refirio a incrementar la produccion de articulos elaborados al aplicar las tecnologias avanzadas, acondicionar nuevos procesos, elevar mas el nivel de tecnica y habilidad y preparar la base material y tecnica por procesar satisfactoriamente a tiempo los minerales concentrados.
					
					En la reunion consultiva, Choe exhorto a todos a registrar notables rendimientos productivos levantandose unanimemente en la construccion de la potencia economica en acato al noble proposito del Dirigente.

articles.title: Simposio de ciencias medicas de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Simposio de ciencias medicas de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 3 y 4 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el 14o simposio de ciencias medicas de Pyongyang de los compatriotas en el pais y en ultramar.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el presidente del Comite Central de la Asociacion de Medicina de Corea Ri Pong Hun y otros funcionarios del sector de salud publica, los miembros de la delegacion de Cientificos Coreanos en la Medicina residentes en Japon encabezada por el vicepresidente de la Asociacion de Medicina de Coreanos residentes en Japon Kim Tae Sik, la de Cientificos Coreanos en la Medicina residentes en Estados Unidos presidida por el vicepresidente de la Asociacion Nacional de los Coreanos Residentes en Estados Unidos Pak Mun Jae.
					
					Ri Pong Hun pronuncio el discurso inaugural, Kim Tae Sik y Pak Mun Jae hicieron discursos de felicitacion.
					
					En el simposio se presentaron varias disertaciones que dan a conocer los exitos de estudio y experiencias logrados en resolver los problemas cientificos y tecnicos pendientes urgentemente en la practica de salud publica y en aplicar los exitos de la rama de ciencias y tecnica de punta en la prevencion de enfermedad y el tratamiento.
					
					Fueron otorgadas las diplomas a los participantes que publicaron disertaciones.
